text: The 1942 Connecticut gubernatorial election was held on November 3, 1942. It was a rematch of the 1940 Connecticut gubernatorial election. Republican nominee Raymond E. Baldwin defeated Democratic incumbent Robert A. Hurley with 48.93% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Raymond E. Baldwin, Republican *Robert A. Hurley, Democratic Other candidates *Jasper McLevy, Socialist *Joseph C. Borden Jr., Socialist Labor ===Results=== ==References== 1942 Connecticut Gubernatorial
title: 1942 Connecticut gubernatorial election
